Waco.Bosqueville High School: Bosqueville High School or Bosqueville Secondary School is a public high school located in a rural area on the north edge of Waco, Texas that serves about 300 students in grades 6-12. It is part of the Bosqueville Independent School District and classified as a 2A school by the UIL. The district covers unincorporated Bosqueville and parts of Waco. Even though the district is mostly in Bosqueville area, it is actually addressed to Waco.
